data.title: Everything You Need to Know About Drew Sidora Ahead of Her 'Real Housewives of Atlanta' Entrance
data.text:
Just ahead of the premiere of The Real Housewives of Atlanta‘s season 13 premiere, we thought we’d welcome their newest cast member to you!

Of course, the singer, actress, and producer needs no introduction, here’s everything we know about Drew Sidora ahead of her entrance into our fav reality television series.

Drew and her husband, Ralph Pittman have been married since 2014. Together the two have two children in addition to Sidora’s son from a previous marriage.

You’ve seen her on That’s So Raven, Step Up, The Game, White Chicks, Girlfriends, and much more!

Sidora founded the charity, DREAMMAKERS – an organization created for young girls and women.

We know that this season, we’ll get an inside look at Sidora’s marriage, a surgery in the middle of the ongoing pandemic, and much more!

See the official trailer for season 13 of The Real Housewives of Atlanta below!

The Real Housewives of Atlanta premieres on Sunday, December 6th at 8 PM on Bravo.
